trends: There have been 9 other sightings in St Clair Shores
There were no other sightings in St Clair Shores on or around July 17th 1977
divs: sighting details i was walking across my front yard,and heard a low humming sound,then after looking all around i looked up and saw the craft hovering in front of me.as i was staring at it there were two beings looking down at me.they were fairly tall and seeminly dressed in robe like attire and their heads were larger than humans.the background was just a yellowish haze.after about a minute a third being came to one of the windows and was also gazing down at me.then one being raised an arm about chest high and gave something to the entity right next to him\her.then all three beings were staring at me,which made me somewhat scared,i hurridly ran into the front door of my house and told my mother, who did not believe me.
Summary: It was metalic, about 25 30 ft. long and 12 to 15 ft. in height., there were three lg. windows in the front.
